mapper.select: select * from (select rownum as recNum, member_ID,MEmber_phoneno,member_last_log,member_name,member_email,member_group from member order by member_id desc) where recNum between(#{section}-1)*100 + (#{pageNum}-1)*10+1 and (#{section}-1)*100+#{pageNum}*10
mapper.update: update member set member_name = #{member_name}, member_address = #{member_address}, member_addrnum = #{member_addrnum}, member_email = #{member_email} where member_id=#{member_id}
